name: Campsyte Site
desc: Designed and developed Campsyte brochure site from sketches to the production of 40 inner pages and blog posts.

text.intro: Campsyte is a small startup converting outdoor under-utilized venues into on-demand theme space. At Campsyte, we envision ourselves as Airbnb for outdoor theme venues. I work closely with founders revamping Campsyte marketing site from design through development to launching.

text.responsibility: Campsyte website was flooded with web traffic in 2015 thanks to ABCNews, Business Insider, and SFGate; however the site, developed in 2013, had confusing flow and couldn’t persuade users to book. The first major project with the team was to edesign the corporate site to improve user understanding and click through. To compound matters, I was the sole UI/UX developer assigned.

content.caption: Campsyte Marketing Site Analysis - Persona, Card Sorting, Site Map, User Story

name: Campsyte App
desc: Designed and developed Campsyte web app from the ground up

text.tech: Ruby on Rails, Haml, Sass, CoffeeScript

text.intro: Campsyte is a members-only web app for seamlessly booking short or long-term outdoor co-working spaces, event venues, or meeting rooms in San Francisco Bay Area. The app also helps Campsyte members utilize the venues efficiently via multiple smart features like on demand meeting room reservations, sharing passes for space use, remote door lock controls, and analytics. I work closely with the founders and engineering team using agile methodologies for conceptualizing and defining design goals to improve UI/UX.

text.responsibility: Campsyte has multiple membership tiers, and each has some key features and its own specialized benefits. As a 'desigineer', I designed prototypes, design specs and built reusable UI components

name: Ags
desc: Renovated AGS website and performed SEO to list on top-10 Google rankings for competitive keywords.

text.intro: AGS is an integrative design firm that specializes in architecture and engineering. Customers range from American Airlines, SFO, and the city of San Francisco serving over 30 years.

text.responsibility: As a marketing designer, I oversee the digital-based marketing assets including: corporate website/intranet sites, social media presence, email newsletters, blog entries, event materials, and presentations. In 2016, I updated the old website and performed SEO to list on top-10 Google rankings for competitive keywords.

name: Aetypic
desc: Renovated Aetypic website and performed SEO to list on top-10 Google rankings for competitive keywords.

text.intro: Aetypic is a San Francisco-based architecture-engineering firm providing architecture, civil, and structural engineering services.

text.responsibility: As a marketing designer, I oversee the digital-based marketing assets including: corporate website/intranet sites, social media presence, email newsletters, blog entries, event materials, and presentations. In 2017, I designed and built Aetypic’s new website from scratch using Wordpress as a CMS.

name: Dj Melodie
desc: Melodie, a well renowned international DJ & Producer has brought her sounds to the dance floors of legendary venues like 1015 and Ruby Skye in San Francisco.

text.intro: Melodie, a well renowned international DJ & Producer has brought her sounds to the dance floors of legendary venues like 1015 and Ruby Skye in San Francisco.

text.responsibility: I'm working with Melodie on her marketing and ecommerce singe page application using VueJS and ExpressJs as the main stack. Together, we are trying to build a site worthy of her passion and engage her fans.
